summary: Governments, groups, and individuals with malicious intent can all pose threats to U.S. cyberspace. DOD's offensive, defensive, and other cyberspace operations support the nation and its allies and partners and protect DOD's own information network. We examined the Department of Defense's cyberspace operations workforce. It includes about: 440 organizations 61,000 personnel 9,500 contractors In addition, it has about 70 organizations and 3,400 personnel in supporting...
title: DOD Cyberspace Operations: About 500 Organizations Have Roles, with Some Potential Overlap
